SELECT CONTR_ID, CONTR_NM, CONTR_AMOUNT, PAYMENT_TERM, CONCAT(SUBSTRING(SPECIAL_NOTE, 1, 50),'...') AS SPECIAL_NOTE, DATE_FORMAT(CONTR_ST_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') As CONTR_ST_DATE, DATE_FORMAT(CONTR_END_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') As CONTR_END_DATE, REGIST_USER_NAME, REGIST_DATE, DEL_YN, CONTR_FILE_ID, ESTIMATE_ID FROM CONTR WHERE DEL_YN = 'N'
AND CONTR_NM LIKE '%' #{contrNm} '%'
AND CONTR_ST_DATE >= #{contrStDate} AND CONTR_END_DATE <= #{contrEndDate}
ORDER BY REGIST_DATE DESC

SELECT CONTR_ID, A.ORIGN_FILE_NAME , E.TOP_CONTR_ID , (SELECT TOP_CONTR_NM FROM TOP_CONTR WHERE TOP_CONTR_ID = E.TOP_CONTR_ID) AS TOP_CONTR_NM, (SELECT COMP_NM FROM COMP WHERE COMP_ID = E.COMP_ID) AS COMP_NM, E.COMP_ID , C.ESTIMATE_ID, CONTR_NM, CONTR_AMOUNT, PAYMENT_TERM, SPECIAL_NOTE, DATE_FORMAT(CONTR_ST_DATE ,'%Y-%m-%d') AS CONTR_ST_DATE , DATE_FORMAT(CONTR_END_DATE ,'%Y-%m-%d')AS CONTR_END_DATE, C.REGIST_USER_NAME, C.REGIST_DATE, C.DEL_YN, CONTR_FILE_ID FROM CONTR C INNER JOIN ESTIMATE E ON C.ESTIMATE_ID = E.ESTIMATE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN ATTACHMENT A ON C.CONTR_FILE_ID = A.FILE_ID WHERE CONTR_ID = #{contrId}
